title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1133/86 of 18 April 1986 on the agricultural convention rate to be applied to export refunds and import levies in respect of certain products processed from fruit and vegetables
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1133/86
of 18 April 1986
on the agricultural convention rate to be applied to export refunds and import levies in respect of certain products processed from fruit and vegetables
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 April 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 49, 27. 2. 1986, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 164, 24. 6. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 164, 24. 6. 1985, p. 11.
(4) OJ No L 51, 28. 2. 1986, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 289, 31. 10. 1985, p. 12.
